title: 98/389/EC: Commission Decision of 19 May 1998 amending for the second time Decisions 96/534/EC and 96/535/EC on financial assistance from the Community for storage of antigen for production of foot-and-mouth disease vaccine in Italy and the United Kingdom (notified under document number C(1998) 1358) (Only the English and Italian texts are authentic) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 19 May 1998 amending for the second time Decisions 96/534/EC and 96/535/EC on financial assistance from the Community for storage of antigen for production of foot-and-mouth disease vaccine in Italy and the United Kingdom (notified under document number C(1998) 1358) (Only the English and Italian texts are authentic) (Text with EEA relevance) (98/389/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 4 of Decisions 96/534/EC and 96/535/EC the date '1 October 1997` is replaced by '1 July 1998`.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 May 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
